getEligibleJurors().details: Get eligible jurors (registered and not slashed)

isEligibleJuror(address).details: Check if an address is an eligible juror

returns._0: Whether the address is an eligible juror

recordVote(address,bool).details: Record a vote for statistical tracking

params.wasCorrect: Whether the vote was with the majority

registerJuror().details: Register as a juror by staking ETH

slashJuror(address,uint256).details: Slash a juror for voting against the majority

params.juror: The address of the juror to slash

withdrawStake(uint256).details: Withdraw stake (only if not slashed and sufficient balance)
